articles.title: State Governments can sub-classify SCs for quota, rules Supreme Court - The Hindu
articles.description: Supreme Court allows State Governments to sub-classify Scheduled Castes for reservation, overruling previous verdict, subject to judicial review.
articles.content: A seven-judge Bench of the Supreme Court headed by Chief Justice of India D.Y. Chandrachud, in a majority judgement, overruled the E.V. Chinnaiah verdict, which had determined that State Legislatures… [+5852 chars]

articles.title: 20 Missing After Cloudburst In Himachal, Monsoon Fury In Uttarakhand Too - NDTV
articles.description: Twenty people are reported to be missing after a cloudburst in Shimla's Rampur. The district administration said the disaster management authority received information about a cloudburst near a hydroelectric power project at Samej Khad early today.
articles.content:
A cloudburst was reported this morning at Shimla's Rampur

articles.title: ITR Deadline Extension: Last date to file income tax return extended to August 31? I-T Dept clarifies - The Financial Express
articles.description: ITR Deadline Extension: Has the Income Tax Department extended the deadline to file income tax return to August 31, as being discussed and spread on the social media. The tax department put a social media post to clarify the matter.

articles.author: Sucheta Anchaliya
articles.title: Exchanges, retail brokers to be affected most by proposed SEBI curbs on F&O trading - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The consultation paper issued by SEBI on Tuesday proposes limiting weekly options contracts to one index per exchange, increase in minimum lot size, and collection of premium amount upfront, among others.
